description: \(Required\) An instance of a generalized queue object indicating the queue from which to send the messages. Contains information describing the desired queue.

DLQ.description: (Required) true, or false. Allows the user to choose the regular or dead letter queue for deleting messages. The default is `false`, which deletes messages from the regular queue.

QueueName.description: (Required) The name of the queue or topic. You can find this in the [List Queues](/api/platformapi#tag/ListQueues) action or in Queue Management.

SubscriberName.description:
(Optional. Use only for topic subscribers.) The name of the subscriber as it exists on the Runtime. You can find this by using the [List Queues](/api/platformapi#tag/ListQueues) action or by looking up the Component ID of the process associated with the subscriber.

 >**Note:** This field is not only the subscriber name shown on the Queue Management screen of the user interface.
